attributes.review:
真情像草原广阔
层层风雨不能阻隔
总有云开 日出时候
万丈阳光照亮你我
真情像梅花开遍
冷冷冰雪不能掩没
就在最冷
枝头绽放
看见春天走向你我
雪花飘飘北风啸啸
天地一片苍茫
一剪寒梅
傲立雪中
只为伊人飘香
爱我所爱无怨无悔
此情长留
心间

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep abreast of Donald’s mental health. The Dementia, the Narcissism, the anger-management issues and psychopathic tendencies.... but this app just says Donald is “great!!!”, America is “great!!!”, Covid is “great!!!”. Anytime I tried to interact with the app, it called me names and grabbed my ass. I demand this app be removed from the store.
attributes.title: Mental Health Check

attributes.review: so i got this app because i wanted to see his plans and all of the elections but apparently the app kept on kicking me off and making my phone overheat, therefore it was making my whole phone lag, i couldn’t go on youtube, messages, ect. i wasn't getting notifications and it drains my battery.
attributes.title: kicks me off.

I would  never hope/suggest for someone to jump off a bridge 😔😢 Except you Orange Bastard 😘😽🥰 I heard of something about murder hornets 🙀😭😫 Hope they sting you ☺️😸🤪 if you see this please don’t rape me 😋😻😳💅🏼 WE SHOULD NOT EAT PIGS 🐖 😩😖😢 except if it’s Trump 🥰😘🤪I think the trash Greta Thunberg was talking about was the Orange in the White House 🥰😩💩☺️🦶

attributes.review: This app keeps crashing my other apps and my phone has never done that before. It also waste my battery sooo fast.Do not recommend getting this app🤢
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and like everyone else is saying, took FOREVER🙄. It took maybe at least 52 weeks to download. Anyways I wasn’t expecting a lot from this app considering the reviews on it. Once I opened it I got a knock on my door. It turned out to be a hoard of rats wearing top hats. They invaded my kitchen and took all of my food. You would think that them having fancy hats that they would have more manners. After trying to clean up my toilets started to act up, spewing raw sewage and trash everywhere. Then I walking in my bedroom just to see that Trumps nudes were leaked onto the news. I went to the store to get some bleach for my eyeballs and got my butt kicked but the rats in top hats. Anyways don’t download this app or you’ll be the rats next victim. 🐀😌💅
attributes.title: Rats in Top Hats 🐀

attributes.review: I was interested in getting this app because I wanted to see what’s on it.HOWEVER... once I downloaded it my phone shut off (even at 85% battery). After I turned it on the app froze and then my front screen kept glitching. I turned my phone off and on again and then when I went into my other apps the screen froze THIS TIME I COULDN'T even TURN IT OFF. My power button stop working and got worried that my phone was going to stay glitching. Not until about 20 minutes later my phone just shut off and waited a little bit to log in again. I then delete the app and everything was fine. fix your app
attributes.title: Glitches your phone and freezes your screen
